#text=One morning , I was brushing my hair and realized it stretched all the way past my shoulders .
#text=I had to pull so far and hard that I realized it was time to get it cut .
#text=I called my barber and scheduled an appointment for 1:00 .
#text=When it came time for my appointment , I drove to the barber shop and waited for my barber to call my name .
#text=I looked through some pamphlets showing all the fancy hairdos I could get , but I decided to keep my simple hairstyle .
#text=When my barber called my name , I sat down in a special chair in front of the sink and leaned my head back .
#text=My barber gave my hair a quick shampoo and a rinse so that it would be clean for him .
#text=Next , I moved over to a special , big chair and he wrapped a smock around me so that the cut hair would n't get on my clothes . ''
#text=`` Just a trim , '' '' I told him .
#text=He pushed a foot pedal at the bottom of the chair and I was raised upwards so that he could see more clearly .
#text=He began snipping at my hair with his scissors , and I watched him in the mirror .
#text=After some time , he put the scissors away and began combing my hair .
#text=He brushed the loose hairs off my neck and unhooked the smock .
#text=The parts of my hair he had cut away were all over the floor .
#text=I paid him and went home with my clean , shorter hair .
